topics.title: Operators in JavaScript
topics.description: Understanding all types of operators - arithmetic, comparison, logical, and more

contents.title: Arithmetic Operators
contents.content:
Arithmetic operators perform mathematical operations on numbers.

Basic Operators:
â€¢ + (Addition): Adds two numbers
â€¢ - (Subtraction): Subtracts second from first
â€¢ * (Multiplication): Multiplies two numbers
â€¢ / (Division): Divides first by second
â€¢ % (Modulus): Returns remainder of division
â€¢ ** (Exponentiation): Raises first to power of second

Unary Operators:
â€¢ ++ (Increment): Increases value by 1
â€¢ -- (Decrement): Decreases value by 1
â€¢ + (Unary plus): Converts to number
â€¢ - (Unary minus): Negates the value

Operator Precedence:
1. Parentheses ()
2. Exponentiation **
3. Multiplication *, Division /, Modulus %
4. Addition +, Subtraction -

contents.title: Arithmetic Examples

examples.title: Real-world Arithmetic
examples.explanation: Arithmetic operators are used in real calculations like pricing, discounts, averages, and more.
